alert.note: Alert for Barnstable; Dukes; Nantucket (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Coastal Flood Advisory issued January 17 at 3:42AM EST until January 17 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Boston
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 9 AM THIS MORNING TO 1 PM EST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Up to one half foot of inundation above ground level expected in low-lying areas near shorelines and tidal waterways (4.3 to 11.4 feet Mean Lower Low Water). * WHERE...Barnstable MA, Dukes MA and Nantucket MA Counties. * WHEN...From 9 AM this morning to 1 PM EST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Minor coastal flooding is expected in the area including Wings Neck. && Time of high total tides are approximate to the nearest hour. info.instruction: If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property.
